```{css, echo=FALSE}
.embed-container {

    padding-bottom: 129%; /* adjust height ratio */
    height: 0;
    overflow: hidden;
    max-width: 100%;
}

.embed-container iframe,
.embed-container object,
.embed-container embed {
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
}

  background-color: #96BEE6;   /* PSU light blue */
  border-color: #96BEE6;       /* PSU light blue */
}

.cv-download.btn-primary:hover {
  background-color: #001E44;   /* PSU navy/darker */
  border-color: #001E44;
}

```
